title: Bibliographic Source
description: A bibliographic source, such as a book or journal article
$comment: This is a top-level database object

firstName.title: First Name
firstName.description: The first name(s) of this author

lastName.title: Last Name
lastName.description: The last name(s) of this author

id.title: ID
id.description: A unique database identifier for this bibliographic source

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of object. Must be set to `BibliographicSource`.

authors.title: Authors
authors.description: An array of authors for this bibliographic source

items.title: Author
items.description: A Person object representing an author

citationKey.title: Citation Key
citationKey.description: A citation key which must be a valid Abbreviation. This field can be used by bibliographic reference management software like Mendeley or Zotero to store the citation key for a source.

city.title: City
city.description: The city in which this bibliographic source was published

doi.title: Digital Object Identifier (DOI)
doi.description: The Digtial Object Identifier (DOI) for this publication. This should be just the DOI itself, not a URL, and should not include the `doi:` prefix (e.g. `10.1075/cal.20.02hie` not `https://doi.org/10.1075/cal.20.02hie` or `doi:10.1075/cal.20.02hie`).

edition.title: Edition
edition.description: The edition of this publication, formatted as an integer

editors.title: Editors
editors.description: An array of editors for this bibliographic source

items.title: Editor
items.description: A Person object representing an editor

link.title: Link
link.description: A link to a web page where this publication may be viewed or downloaded

pages.title: Pages
pages.description: The page numbers of this publication

publication.title: Publication
publication.description: The publication that this bibliographic source is published in

publisher.title: Publisher (or Institution)
publisher.description: The name of the publisher of this soruce, or the institution where it was published

series.title: Series
series.description: The series in which this publication was published

translators.title: Translators
translators.description: An array of translators for this bibliographic source

items.title: Translator (Person)
items.description: A Person object representing a translator

url.title: JSON URL
url.description: A URL for the JSON data for this bibliographic source

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: The volume number for this publication

year.title: Year
year.description: The year this item was published. Use a positive integer for AD / ACE, and a negative integer for BC / BCE.

examples.publication: Category change from a constructional perspective
examples.title: Category genesis in Chitimacha
